snippet: Adam Scott, who crumbled at the British Open, is looking to defend his title at the Bridgestone Invitational.
abstract: Adam Scott, who crumbled at the British Open, is looking to defend his title at the Bridgestone Invitational golf tournament.
lead_paragraph: Adam Scott, who crumbled at the British Open, is looking to defend his title at the Bridgestone Invitational.

headline.seo: Scott Looking to Rebound From British Open Collapse
headline.main: After Collapse at British Open, a Title Defense in Ohio
headline.print_headline: A Collapse in England, a Title Defense in Ohio
